Title: One More Chance

Actors: John Lloyd Cruz, Bea Alonzo, Derek Ramsay, Maja Salvador
Plot: Longtime couple Basha (Bea Alonzo) and Popoy (John Lloyd Cruz) are practically inseparable, so when they split up, it's not surprising how heartbroken each feels. But Basha, stifled by the ...
